short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helping you continue to interact with youtube while it thinks you are away

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever left Youtube in the background while doing something else and realized the video stopped because it asked if you are still watching? Well, no more! This extension gives you the freedom to watch or listen to anything on Youtube without it being paused.
